    • Field Detail

      • timeToLive

        public static float timeToLive
        Time for how long this entity should be alive. Should be defined and configured for every entity.

      • shouldDie

        public boolean shouldDie()
        Description copied from class: BaseEntity
        Checks if this entity is without visual long enough so that it can be removed safely. This method implicitly returns true and should be overridden by entities that don't want to be removed (dynamic ones).
        Overrides:
        shouldDie in class BaseEntity
        Returns:
        True if the entity should be removed (it lived longer without any visuals than intended). False otherwise.
